## JsonEditorState.failValidation() method

Helper method to constructs `DetailedFailure` with appropriate details and messaging for various validation failures.

**Signature:**

```typescript
failValidation<T = JsonObject>(rule: JsonEditorValidationRules, message?: string, validation?: IJsonEditorValidationOptions): DetailedFailure<T, JsonEditFailureReason>;
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A string message describing the failed validation.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The [validation options](./ts-json.ijsoneditorvalidationoptions.md) in effect.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

DetailedFailure&lt;T, [JsonEditFailureReason](./ts-json.jsoneditfailurereason.md)<!-- -->&gt;
